titleInfo.title: Statement on demographically conditioned problems in the 21st century: from the problem of carrying capacity to the problem of intergenerational equity

originInfo.publisher: BiB, Bundesinst. für Bevölkerungsforschung beim Statist. Bundesamt

titleInfo.title: "Advising policy makers in population matters": round-table discussion at the occasion of the 25th anniversary of the BiB, Wiesbaden , November 26, 1998

bibliographicCitation.lncs: Birg, H.: Statement on demographically conditioned problems in the 21st century: from the problem of carrying capacity to the problem of intergenerational equity. In: Höhn, C. (ed.) "Advising policy makers in population matters": round-table discussion at the occasion of the 25th anniversary of the BiB, Wiesbaden , November 26, 1998.
